item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“atrix676, post:5, topic:274954”][quote author=`Joshua link=topic=363257.msg2759346#msg2759346 date=1240434434]

}
if(NPCID == 1552){
                     NpcDialogue = 111;
                     NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

[/quote]
djspanke already sloved my problem[/quote]
But you could have just removed the rights requirement, as `Joshua stated above.

item.dc:creator: @system system

@system wrote:

[quote=“djspanke, post:2, topic:274954”]needs to be >= 0

0 means more than 0, which is 1+[/quote]
